snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include an analysis of start-ups worth $1 billion and an explanation by The Washington Post drills into how the National Security Agency is tapping Google’s and Yahoo’s networks.
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include an analysis of start-ups worth $1 billion and an explanation by The Washington Post drills into how the National Security Agency is tapping Google’s and Yahoo’s networks.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: The Unicorn Club, and Explaining N.S.A. Access to Tech Company Data
